resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::Route`` resource creates a route for an API.

properties.name: ApiKeyRequired
properties.description: Specifies whether an API key is required for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: Specifies whether an API key is required for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

properties.name: AuthorizationScopes
properties.description: The authorization scopes supported by this route.

type.description: The authorization scopes supported by this route.

properties.name: AuthorizationType
properties.description: The authorization type for the route. For WebSocket APIs, valid values are ``NONE`` for open access, ``AWS_IAM`` for using AWS IAM permissions, and ``CUSTOM`` for using a Lambda authorizer. For HTTP APIs, valid values are ``NONE`` for open access, ``JWT`` for using JSON Web Tokens, ``AWS_IAM`` for using AWS IAM permissions, and ``CUSTOM`` for using a Lambda authorizer.

type.description: The authorization type for the route. For WebSocket APIs, valid values are ``NONE`` for open access, ``AWS_IAM`` for using AWS IAM permissions, and ``CUSTOM`` for using a Lambda authorizer. For HTTP APIs, valid values are ``NONE`` for open access, ``JWT`` for using JSON Web Tokens, ``AWS_IAM`` for using AWS IAM permissions, and ``CUSTOM`` for using a Lambda authorizer.

properties.name: AuthorizerId
properties.description: The identifier of the ``Authorizer`` resource to be associated with this route. The authorizer identifier is generated by API Gateway when you created the authorizer.

type.description: The identifier of the ``Authorizer`` resource to be associated with this route. The authorizer identifier is generated by API Gateway when you created the authorizer.

properties.name: ModelSelectionExpression
properties.description: The model selection expression for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: The model selection expression for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

properties.name: OperationName
properties.description: The operation name for the route.

type.description: The operation name for the route.

properties.name: RequestModels
properties.description: The request models for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: The request models for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

properties.name: RequestParameters
properties.description: The request parameters for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: The request parameters for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

properties.name: RouteKey
properties.description: The route key for the route. For HTTP APIs, the route key can be either ``$default``, or a combination of an HTTP method and resource path, for example, ``GET /pets``.

type.description: The route key for the route. For HTTP APIs, the route key can be either ``$default``, or a combination of an HTTP method and resource path, for example, ``GET /pets``.

properties.name: RouteResponseSelectionExpression
properties.description: The route response selection expression for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: The route response selection expression for the route. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::Route`` resource creates a route for an API.
